00019   RunLocationWhizard::RunLocationWhizard(std::string folder, std::string dbinit) {
00020     _folder = folder;
00021     _dbinit = dbinit;
00022     createConditionsHandler();
00023    }

00025   RunLocationWhizard::RunLocationWhizard() : 
00026   _folder("/expert_cd_calice/CALDAQ_RunLocation"), 
00027   _dbinit( DBInitString() ) 
00028   {createConditionsHandler();}

00031   void RunLocationWhizard::createConditionsHandler() {
00032     //Give an arbitrary Collection Name, needed by the inter face 
00033     std::string colName = "RunTimeCol";
00034     _conData = new lccd::DBCondHandler( _dbinit, _folder, colName, "" ) ;
00035 
00036   }

00038 
00039   string RunLocationWhizard::getRunLocation(int run){
00040      //Access the folder at the desired time stamp (note here we transform the
00041      //runnumber into a timestamp, we cheat a bit
00042      _conData->update( static_cast<lccd::LCCDTimeStamp>(run));
00043      //Get the collection
00044      LCCollection* col = _conData->currentCollection();
00045      //Obtain the time
00046      RunLocation runlocation(col->getElementAt(0));
00047      return runlocation.getLocation();
00048   }
00049 
00050 
00051   string RunLocationWhizard::getGenericRunType(int run){
00052      //Access the folder at the desired time stamp (note here we transform the
00053      //runnumber into a timestamp, we cheat a bit
00054      _conData->update( static_cast<lccd::LCCDTimeStamp>(run));
00055      //Get the collection
00056      LCCollection* col = _conData->currentCollection();
00057      //Obtain the time
00058      RunLocation runlocation(col->getElementAt(0));
00059      return runlocation.getGenericRunType();
00060   }
00061 
00062 
00063   string RunLocationWhizard::getGenericRunMonth(int run){
00064      //Access the folder at the desired time stamp (note here we transform the
00065      //runnumber into a timestamp, we cheat a bit
00066      _conData->update( static_cast<lccd::LCCDTimeStamp>(run));
00067      //Get the collection
00068      LCCollection* col = _conData->currentCollection();
00069      //Obtain the time
00070      RunLocation runlocation(col->getElementAt(0));
00071      return runlocation.getMonthInfo();
00072   }

00075   void RunLocationWhizard::print( int run,  std::ostream& os ){
00076 
00077     os << " Runnumber: " << run << std::endl;
00078     os << " Taken at: " << getRunLocation(run) << std::endl;
00079     os << " of type: " << getGenericRunType(run) << std::endl; 
00080     os << " on: " << getGenericRunMonth(run) << std::endl; 
00081   }
